testcase.name: ReadyToWork home page launching
testcase.system-out: Given browser is launched...................................................passed And ready to work "https://readytowork.absa.africa/" page is open...........passed Then Ready to Work e-learning platform is displayed.........................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Test ReadyToWork: login with invalid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given browser is launched...................................................passed And ready to work "https://readytowork.absa.africa/login" page is open......passed Then verify login page is open..............................................passed When user enters sphelelez101@gmail.com and Nok2lasphe123...................passed And user click on sign in button............................................passed Then message display no active account with the given credentials...........passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Test ReadyToWork: login with valid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given browser is launched...................................................passed And ready to work "https://readytowork.absa.africa/login" page is open......passed Then verify login page is open..............................................passed When user enters sphelelez101@gmail.com and Nok2lasphe......................passed And user click on sign in button............................................passed Then user logged in successfully............................................passed And verify My learning page is open.........................................passed And user click on logout button.............................................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Test Ready To Work: Forgot Password with valid email or account
testcase.system-out: Given browser is launched...................................................passed And ready to work "https://readytowork.absa.africa/login" page is open......passed Then verify login page is open..............................................passed And user click on forgot password button....................................passed And verify forgot password is open..........................................passed When user enters email "sphelelez101@gmail.com".............................passed And user click on reset Password button.....................................passed Then Alert display email sent please check your inbox.......................passed And click on okay button....................................................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Forgot Password with invalid email or account
testcase.system-out: Given browser is launched...................................................passed And ready to work "https://readytowork.absa.africa/login" page is open......passed Then verify login page is open..............................................passed And user click on forgot password button....................................passed And verify forgot password is open..........................................passed When user enters email "sphelelez103331@gmail.co"...........................passed And user click on reset Password button.....................................passed Then Alert display there is no associated with email address................passed And click on close button...................................................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed
